description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Ho Chi Minh City Escape in Elegant Ba Son Neighbourhood with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the pulsating heart of Vietnam with a stay at Hotel Indigo Saigon The City, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned amid the city's bustling District 1. This vibrant escape is a stone's throw from the city's iconic landmarks, including the Notre-Dame Cathedral Basilica of Saigon and the Central Post Office. Savour authentic Vietnamese cuisine at the hotel's Neighbourhood Cafe, or sip on refreshing cocktails by the rooftop pool, boasting panoramic city views.

hotels.title: Chic Ho Chi Minh City Apartment Escape near Crescent Mall & Convention Centre with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Step into a world of refined Ho Chi Minh City living at this ideally positioned sanctuary in the dynamic District 7. Perfect for couples or groups, the hotel's studio and apartment-style accommodations make living easy in this prime location, near the SECC Saigon Exhibition and Convention Centre. Feast on authentic Vietnamese and Asian fusion at the all-day dining Food Exchange and sip on refreshing cocktails at its bar. If you wish to step out, glitzy Crescent Mall is moments away along with the picturesque waterfront promenade, lined with charming cafes and restaurants, offers serene vistas of the Saigon River.

hotels.title: French Colonial Grandeur in Ho Chi Minh City Centre with Award-Winning Dining & Spa
hotels.description: Set beside the Saigon Opera House in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City, this stately hotel pairs French colonial elegance with contemporary sophistication. Inside, days unfold with pastries from The Pastry Boutique, French-Vietnamese at Square One or trattoria-style Italian at Opera, and wind down with cocktails at 2 Lam Son and melt-in-your-mouth treats at Chocolaterie. Settle into a sunlounger by the palm-lined outdoor pool or enjoy a deeply restorative treatment inspired by the botanicals of the Mekong Delta at Xuan Spa. Just beyond the hotel, Dong Khoi Street, the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Central Post Office are within walking distance, making this the ideal refined base for discovery in Ho Chi Minh City.

hotels.title: Ultra Modern Ho Chi Minh City Escape Near the Airport with Restaurant, Bar & Spa
hotels.description: Perfect for passing through, or for a longer break, Parkroyal Saigon is just 10 minutes from the airport and meters from the cultural attractions and culinary delights home to Ho Chi Minh City. Enjoy the warm hospitality Vietnam is famous for while sipping a cocktail poolside, or while indulging in elegant dining at the hotelâ€™s own Garden Brasserie. After days exploring the city, treat yourself to a moment of pure relaxation at the in-house St. Gregory Spa offering a wide range of decadent treatments.

hotels.title: Signature Luxury in Central Ho Chi Minh with Rooftop Pool, Spa & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Experience Ho Chi Minh City with a stay a signature Sofitel stay, perfectly positioned in the heart of the city's bustling District 1. This French colonial-style hotel is a stone's throw from the city's most renowned landmarks, including the Saigon Notre-Dame Basilica and the War Remnants Museum. Savour the flavours of Vietnam at Le 17 Bistro, where you can enjoy local dishes with a French twist, or sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the chic Boudoir Lounge. For a change of pace, take a leisurely stroll along the Saigon River, just minutes from the hotel. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's rooftop pool for a refreshing dip, or rejuvenate your senses at BREMIERE Spa.

hotels.title: Landmark Five-Star Ho Chi Minh Escape in the Heart of Saigon with Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Discover the beautiful French architecture and delicious street food of Ho Chi Minh City with a stay at the iconic Caravelle Saigon. Set in pulsing District 1 - also known as Downtown Saigon, an eclectic mix of old-world charm and fast-lane modernity - within walking distance of the city's most iconic sights, Caravelle Saigon offers world-class facilities and the finest comforts in one of the best locations in Ho Chi Minh City. Originally opened in 1959, this boutique hotel has been at the centre of some of the city's most significant cultural events. Whilst the original building has been lovingly refurbished, its striking French-Vietnamese style survived. Its gracefully curved balconies offer the grandest panoramas of Ho Chi Minh City, while the rooftop bar serves an unbeatable combination of expert cocktails and local brews.
